name: _id
description: The address of the account, in bech32 encoding. Same as `address`.

name: balance
description: The amount of ESDT token the address possesses. It includes the number of decimals.

name: balanceNum
description: The amount of ESDT tokens the address possesses, in a numeric format.

name: data

fields.name: creator
fields.description: The bech32 encoded address of the token's creator.

fields.name: nonEmptyURIs
fields.description: True if the token has non empty uris.

fields.name: whiteListedStorage
fields.description: True if the token has white-listed storage. An NFT/SFT has white-listed storage if the URI belongs to one of the allowed decentralized storage services, such as IPFS or Pinata.

description: A structure that contains extra data about a token, such as the creator of an NFT.

name: identifier
description: The identifier field consists of `token` field and the `nonce` field hex encoded (example: `TOKEN-01abdc-01`).

name: timestamp
description: The timestamp when the address balance was changed.

name: tokenNonce
description: The sequence number of the token. This field is empty in the case of `FungibleESDT`.

name: type
description: The type of the ESDT token. It can be `FungibleESDT`, `NonFungibleESDT`, `SemiFungibleESDT`, or `MetaESDT`.

name: frozen
description: The frozen field is set to true when the address possesses a current ESDT token that is in a frozen state.
